argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-rel | |- ( Rel R <-> R C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_biimpi | |- ( Rel R -> R C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_sselda | |- ( ( Rel R /\ A e. R ) -> A e. ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_1stval2 | |- ( A e. ( _V X. _V ) -> ( 1st ` A ) = |^| |^| A ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( ( Rel R /\ A e. R ) -> ( 1st ` A ) = |^| |^| A ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elreldm | |- ( ( Rel R /\ A e. R ) -> |^| |^| A e. dom R ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( Rel R /\ A e. R ) -> ( 1st ` A ) e. dom R ) |
